title: How to stop my account from being deleted
body: So after failing my promos I got a little hot headed and deciided to see if I could delete my account so that I could restart, but at that time I wasn't thinking how much of a pain it would be to restart I was just really mad. So riot is gonna delete my account in 5 days how do I tell them to stop from making that happen?

replies.body: Do the same thing you did to submit the deletion request! Simply reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should still be able to get that stopped.
i cant it says that I have to verify my email and I cant do that since a rioter changed my email and I can't do it my self. So in conclusion i cant even send a ticket :(

Hey there, no worries!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which doesn't require you to sign in but instead submit an email you do have access to.  See you there!
